markdownRemark.html:
Last week I was playing nonogram during lunchtime.

“I am addicted to this game right now,” said me to my colleague, “Maybe if I can come up with a program to solve this, I would stop playing it anymore” And then we went into discussion of algorithms, machine learnings, computer visions…

I can’t remember how our topic went from one to another, but one thing stuck to my head, I need to write a software to solve my nonogram!

frontmatter.title: Solving nonogram with code
frontmatter.description: ...said me to my colleague, "Maybe if I can come up with a program to solve this, I would stop playing it anymore"

frontmatter.title: Step-by-step guide for writing a custom babel transformation
